name: Matching Urls
description: Regex to Match Http/Https and Url without the trasfer protocol. Still in progress.. but works :)
content:
Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com! https://www.google.com http://www.google.com www.google.com www.google.com
HTTP://WWW.GOOGLE.COM Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with ctrl-z. Save & Share expressions with friends or the Community. A full Reference & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial. Sample text for testing: abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ 0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"' 12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42 555.123.4567 +1-(800)-555-2468 foo@demo.net bar.ba@test.co.uk www.demo.com http://foo.co.uk/ http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar https://www.google.com.mt/search?q=url+link&oq=url+link&aqs=chrome..69i57j0l5.1090j0j4&sourceid=chrome&es_sm=93&ie=UTF-8
author: Matthew Mangion
